sentences.en: According to the orthodoxy, metaphors only play a secondary, heuristic role in the context of discovery.
sentences.cn: 按照传统的看法, 隐喻仅仅在科学发现的与境中发挥着次要的启发作用.

sentences.en: According to this new orthodoxy, macroeconomic stability should be achieved through interest rates.
sentences.cn: 根据这一新的正统理论, 宏观经济稳定应通过利率实现.

sentences.en: an economist arguing against the current financial orthodoxy
sentences.cn: 一位批驳现行正统金融观念的经济学家

sentences.en: And who will pay the price for this triumph of orthodoxy?
sentences.cn: 然后谁将为此正统理论的代价买单?

sentences.en: At the same time, it upset Christian orthodoxy, even the attenuated Unitarian form.
sentences.cn: 同时, 它颠覆了基督教的正统, 甚至日益衰落的一神论的形式.

sentences.en: Berel had remained true to the old orthodoxy.
sentences.cn: 斑瑞尔一直忠实格守古老的正统观念.

sentences.en: First, British and French clerics demonised Russian Orthodoxy as a semi - pagan creed.
sentences.cn: 首先, 英法两国教士将俄国东正教妖魔化为一种半异教信条.

sentences.en: He challenged the political orthodoxy of his time.
sentences.cn: 他对同时代的正统政治观念提出了质疑。

sentences.en: If you simplify your English, you are freed from the worst follies of orthodoxy.
sentences.cn: 如果你简化你的英语，你就不会有正统说教的最蠢笨的做法。

sentences.en: One consequence of this is that a number of pillars of business orthodoxy are being eroded.
sentences.cn: 这引发的一个后果就是，一些核心的正统商业思想逐渐受到腐蚀。

sentences.en: Orthodoxy means not thinking -- not needing to think.
sentences.cn: 正统的意思,是不要去想 —— 不需要想.

sentences.en: Since then, economists have vied with each other to overturn this orthodoxy.
sentences.cn: 自此之后, 经济学家就开始争相颠覆这个传统理论.

sentences.en: There was a direct intimate connexion between chastity and political orthodoxy.
sentences.cn: 纯洁身心跟政治正统,真有种直接又紧密的联系.

sentences.en: These ideas have now become part of educational orthodoxy.
sentences.cn: 这些观点现已成为正统教育理念的一部分。

sentences.en: These ideas rapidly became the new orthodoxy in linguistics.
sentences.cn: 这些观点迅速成为语言学中新的正统观念。

sentences.en: We are not obliged to sound the Bishop of D ---- on the score of orthodoxy.
sentences.cn: 在宗教的真谛问题上,我们对 迪涅 的主教先生不能作任何窥测.

sentences.en: When they ( scientists ) stop questioning orthodoxy, mankind will have given up the search for truth.
sentences.cn: 到他们不再怀疑正统说法之日, 便是人类放弃追求真理之时.

sentences.en: Yesterday's Heresy, Today's Orthodoxy, Tomorrow's Anachronism.
sentences.cn: 昨天的异端, 今天的信条, 明天就落伍.
